nfc.title: Please place your Turkish ID card on the NFC reader.

form.title: Please Enter Your Information
form.instruction: Touch the relevant fields and enter from the keyboard.
form.note: *Demographic information cannot be updated as it is retrieved from the NVI system. Only colored fields can be updated

otp.title: Please Enter Your Information
otp.instruction: Please enter the code sent to your phone to approve the consent form regarding the processing of personal data..
